The PCMCIA device strings in Windows are.. *PCMCIA\ACTIONTEC-PRISM_Wireless_LAN_PC_Card-1668-0101 *PCMCIA\ACTIONTEC-PRISM_Wireless_LAN_PC_Card-0BAF This card provides the following output using '''pccardctl ident'''...

", "PRISM Wireless LAN PC Card

", "RevA
"

  function: 6 (network)
